defences.description: Long range defense, good vs. missile troops.
Spreads out and burns short-range troops.
Fragile but powerful.  Good against cavalry.
Basic defense. Long range but low damage.
A solid shield for stronger defenses.
Good for killing a few melee troops.
Squashes those who get too close.
Very long range but somewhat erratic.
